1.rationale:
Looking at the board, we currently have a few possible moves. We could move up, down, or to the right, as moving to the left would cause us to collide with the border and lose the game. 

If we move to the right, we would be heading closer to the cluster of apples at the top right corner, but we would also be further away from the bottom left corner where another apple is situated. 

If we move up, we could gather one apple a little quicker, but also take longer to reach the apples at the other sides of the board. 

Moving down, on the other hand, would guide us towards the bottom left corner apple while keeping a safe distance from snake #2.

After analyzing the scenarios, going up to collect the apple at (1, 4) seems to be our best bet right now. 

Next move: UP.
